rotateEncryptionKey

public void rotateEncryptionKey(java.lang.String container,
                                java.lang.String key,
                                java.security.PrivateKey decryptionKey)
Description copied from interface: EncryptedCloudStorage
Re-encrypt an already encrypted Object with a new KeyPair. The original KeyPair must be provided for this operation.

Specified by:
rotateEncryptionKey in interface EncryptedCloudStorage
Parameters:
container - the Container name
key - the Object key
decryptionKey - the private key required to decrypt the specified Object
